Name: gastrointestinal neuroendocrine tumor
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that has_material_basis_in neuroendocrine cells.

Name: gastrointestinal carcinoma
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that has_material_basis_in epithelial cells.

Name: pharynx cancer
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the pharynx.

Name: obsolete skeletal system benign neoplasm
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the pharynx.

Name: hepatobiliary system cancer
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the hepatobiliary system.

Name: gastroesophageal cancer
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the proximal esophagus and the distal stomach.

Name: peritoneal carcinoma
Definition: A carcinoma that is located_in the inside of the abdomen.

Name: gastrointestinal lymphoma
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the intestine.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's sarcoma involving lymph nodes of axilla and upper limb
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the intestine.
Synonym: Hodgkin's sarcoma of lymph nodes of axilla and/or upper limb (disorder)

Name: gastrointestinal stromal tumor
Definition: An inherited metabolic disorder that is characterized by impaired synthesis and degradation of amino acids.
